verses.verse: There was a man <S%G444><s%> of the Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Nicodemus, <S%G3530><s%> a ruler <S%G758><s%> of the Jews: <S%G2453><s%>

The same <S%G3778><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to Jesus <S%G2424><s%> by night, <S%G3571><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Rabbi, <S%G4461><s%> we know <S%G1492><s%> that you are a teacher <S%G1320><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> from God: <S%G2316><s%> for no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> miracles <S%G4592><s%> that you do, <S%G4160><s%> except <S%G3362><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> be with him.

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, Except <S%G3362><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> be born <S%G1080><s%> again, <S%G509><s%> he cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> see <S%G1492><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Nicodemus <S%G3530><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, How <S%G4459><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> be born <S%G1080><s%> when he is old? <S%G1088><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> he enter <S%G1525><s%> the second <S%G1208><s%> time <S%G1208><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his mother's <S%G3384><s%> womb, <S%G2836><s%> and be born? <S%G1080><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, Except <S%G3362><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> be born <S%G1080><s%> of water <S%G5204><s%> and of the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> he cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>
That which is born <S%G1080><s%> of the flesh <S%G4561><s%> is flesh; <S%G4561><s%> and that which is born <S%G1080><s%> of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> is spirit. <S%G4151><s%>
Marvel <S%G2296><s%> not that I said <S%G2036><s%> to you, You must <S%G1163><s%> be born <S%G1080><s%> again. <S%G509><s%>

The wind <S%G4151><s%> blows <S%G4154><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> it wants, <S%G2309><s%> and you hear <S%G191><s%> the sound <S%G5456><s%> thereof, <S%G846><s%> but can <S%G1492><s%> not tell <S%G1492><s%> from where <S%G4159><s%> it comes, <S%G2064><s%> and where <S%G4226><s%> it goes: <S%G5217><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> is every <S%G3956><s%> one that is born <S%G1080><s%> of the Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>
Nicodemus <S%G3530><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to him, How <S%G4459><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things be?
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Are <S%G1488><s%> you a master <S%G1320><s%> of Israel, <S%G2474><s%> and know <S%G1097><s%> not these <S%G5023><s%> things?

Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, We speak <S%G2980><s%> that we do know, <S%G1492><s%> and testify <S%G3140><s%> that we have seen; <S%G3708><s%> and you receive <S%G2983><s%> not our witness. <S%G3141><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> I have told <S%G2036><s%> you earthly <S%G1919><s%> things, and you believe <S%G4100><s%> not, how <S%G4459><s%> shall you believe, <S%G4100><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> I tell <S%G2036><s%> you of heavenly <S%G2032><s%> things?

And no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> has ascended <S%G305><s%> up to heaven, <S%G3772><s%> but he that came <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> from heaven, <S%G3772><s%> even the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

And as Moses <S%G3475><s%> lifted <S%G5312><s%> up the serpent <S%G3789><s%> in the wilderness, <S%G2048><s%> even so <S%G3779><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> be lifted <S%G5312><s%> up:
That whoever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> believes <S%G4100><s%> in him should not perish, <S%G622><s%> but have <S%G2192><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>

For God <S%G2316><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> the world, <S%G2889><s%> that he gave <S%G1325><s%> his only <S%G3439><s%> begotten <S%G3439><s%> Son, <S%G5207><s%> that whoever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> believes <S%G4100><s%> in him should not perish, <S%G622><s%> but have <S%G2192><s%> everlasting <S%G166><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>

For God <S%G2316><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> not his Son <S%G5207><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> to condemn <S%G2919><s%> the world; <S%G2889><s%> but that the world <S%G2889><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> him might be saved. <S%G4982><s%>

He that believes <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> him is not condemned: <S%G2919><s%> but he that believes <S%G4100><s%> not is condemned <S%G2919><s%> already, <S%G2235><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he has not believed <S%G4100><s%> in the name <S%G3686><s%> of the only <S%G3439><s%> begotten <S%G3439><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And this <S%G3778><s%> is the condemnation, <S%G2920><s%> that light <S%G5457><s%> is come <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the world, <S%G2889><s%> and men <S%G444><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> darkness <S%G4655><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> light, <S%G5457><s%> because <S%G1063><s%> their deeds <S%G2041><s%> were evil. <S%G4190><s%>

For every <S%G3956><s%> one that does <S%G4160><s%> evil <S%G5337><s%> hates <S%G3404><s%> the light, <S%G5457><s%> neither <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> to the light, <S%G5457><s%> lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> his deeds <S%G2041><s%> should be reproved. <S%G1651><s%>

But he that does <S%G4160><s%> truth <S%G225><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> to the light, <S%G5457><s%> that his deeds <S%G2041><s%> may be made <S%G5319><s%> manifest, <S%G5319><s%> that they are worked <S%G2038><s%> in God. <S%G2316><s%>

After <S%G3326><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things came <S%G2064><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> and his disciples <S%G3101><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the land <S%G1093><s%> of Judaea; <S%G2449><s%> and there <S%G1563><s%> he tarried <S%G1304><s%> with them, and baptized. <S%G907><s%>

And John <S%G2491><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> was baptizing <S%G907><s%> in Aenon <S%G137><s%> near <S%G1451><s%> to Salim, <S%G4530><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> there was much <S%G4183><s%> water <S%G5204><s%> there: <S%G1563><s%> and they came, <S%G3854><s%> and were baptized. <S%G907><s%>
For John <S%G2491><s%> was not yet <S%G3768><s%> cast <S%G906><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> prison. <S%G5438><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> there arose <S%G1096><s%> a question <S%G2214><s%> between <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3326><s%> some of John's <S%G2491><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> and the Jews <S%G2453><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> purifying. <S%G2512><s%>

And they came <S%G2064><s%> to John, <S%G2491><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Rabbi, <S%G4461><s%> he that was with you beyond <S%G4008><s%> Jordan, <S%G2446><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> you bore <S%G3140><s%> witness, <S%G3140><s%> behold, <S%G2396><s%> the same <S%G3778><s%> baptizes, <S%G907><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> men come <S%G2064><s%> to him.

John <S%G2491><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> A man <S%G444><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> receive <S%G2983><s%> nothing, <S%G3762><s%> except <S%G3362><s%> it be given <S%G1325><s%> him from heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

You yourselves <S%G5210><s%> <S%G846><s%> bear <S%G3140><s%> me witness, <S%G3140><s%> that I said, <S%G2036><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> not the Christ, <S%G5547><s%> but that I am <S%G1510><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> him.

He that has <S%G2192><s%> the bride <S%G3565><s%> is the bridegroom: <S%G3566><s%> but the friend <S%G5384><s%> of the bridegroom, <S%G3566><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> stands <S%G2476><s%> and hears <S%G191><s%> him, rejoices <S%G5463><s%> greatly <S%G5479><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of the bridegroom's <S%G3566><s%> voice: <S%G5456><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> my joy <S%G5479><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> is fulfilled. <S%G4137><s%>
He must <S%G1163><s%> increase, <S%G837><s%> but I must decrease. <S%G1642><s%>

He that comes <S%G2064><s%> from above <S%G509><s%> is above <S%G1883><s%> all: <S%G3956><s%> he that is of the earth <S%G1093><s%> is earthly, <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1093><s%> and speaks <S%G2980><s%> of the earth: <S%G1093><s%> he that comes <S%G2064><s%> from heaven <S%G3772><s%> is above <S%G1883><s%> all. <S%G3956><s%>
And what <S%G3739><s%> he has seen <S%G3708><s%> and heard, <S%G191><s%> that he testifies; <S%G3140><s%> and no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> receives <S%G2983><s%> his testimony. <S%G3141><s%>
He that has received <S%G2983><s%> his testimony <S%G3141><s%> has set <S%G4972><s%> to his seal <S%G4972><s%> that God <S%G2316><s%> is true. <S%G227><s%>

For he whom <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has sent <S%G649><s%> speaks <S%G2980><s%> the words <S%G4487><s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%> for God <S%G2316><s%> gives <S%G1325><s%> not the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> by measure <S%G3358><s%> to him.
The Father <S%G3962><s%> loves <S%G25><s%> the Son, <S%G5207><s%> and has given <S%G1325><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things into <S%G1722><s%> his hand. <S%G5495><s%>

He that believes <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> everlasting <S%G166><s%> life: <S%G2222><s%> and he that believes <S%G544><s%> not the Son <S%G5207><s%> shall not see <S%G3700><s%> life; <S%G2222><s%> but the wrath <S%G3709><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> stays <S%G3306><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> him.
